long_description: The super-size TravelChair Big Kahuna chair features oversize tubing and large grommets to stand up to heavy loads and regular use. Chair has a powder-coated steel frame that is reinforced throughout to support up to 700 lbs. Rugged polyester seat fabric endures regular use in the outdoors. Cup holder and side pocket keep a beverage and a good book within reach. The TravelChair Big Kahuna chair folds up to 39 x 5 x 5 in. for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: The super-size TravelChair Big Kahuna chair features oversize tubing and large grommets to stand up to heavy loads and regular use.
